video.title: The Assets
video.synopsis: CIA counterintelligence expert Sandy Grimes is assigned a vital mission: identify the Soviet mole thought to be operating within the agency itself.

episodes.synopsis: When a rendezvous with a valuable asset goes awry, CIA officer Sandy Grimes's investigation into the situation reveals more than she expected.
episodes.title: My Name is Aldrich Ames

episodes.synopsis: When high-ranking KGB officer Vitaly Yurchenko defects to the United States and reveals knowledge of a CIA mole, Ames considers drastic measures.
episodes.title: Jewel in the Crown

episodes.synopsis: After Yurchenko's shocking disclosure, the CIA and FBI go after Edward Lee Howard, but Sandy remains concerned about potential agency leaks.
episodes.title: Trip to Vienna

episodes.synopsis: Sandy butts heads with a senior officer regarding a breach, while Ames feels increasing pressure both from the Soviets and at home.
episodes.title: What's Done is Done

episodes.synopsis: Ames learns his request for a transfer has been approved, and a potential asset contacts the CIA claiming to have information about a breach.
episodes.title: Check Mate

episodes.synopsis: Having put aside their differences, Sandy and Jeanne move full steam ahead with their mole hunt, but the investigation experiences a serious setback.
episodes.title: Small Useless Truth

episodes.synopsis: Amid the fall of the Berlin Wall and communism's collapse, Ames struggles to keep his identity hidden, while Sandy is convinced he is the mole.
episodes.title: The Straw Poll

episodes.synopsis: Sandy seeks definitive proof to allow the Justice Department to target Ames, while Ames debates whether to fight or confess and protect his family.
episodes.title: Avenger

episodes.synopsis: Get the scoop on the real Aldrich Ames, the spy who sold U.S. secrets to the Soviets, in this profile of the true story behind the drama "The Assets."
episodes.title: The Spycatchers: The True Story Behind The Assets
